newsitem.title: JAPAN: Japan likely to auction 10-year JGBs next Tuesday.
newsitem.headline: Japan likely to auction 10-year JGBs next Tuesday.

text.p: Japan"s Ministry of Finance (MOF) is likely to offer 10-year Japanese government bonds (JGBs) next Tuesday, partly through a price-competitive auction, market sources said on Tuesday.
The amount is likely to be around one trillion yen, bond traders said.
MOF last auctioned 10-year JGBs on January 28, when it offered one trillion yen worth at a record low coupon rate of 2.6 percent.
MOF is also likely to offer two-year notes through a price-competitive auction sometime next week, market sources said.
